title: Can I use prayer timings of University of Karachi for Isha? Umm al qura for 4 prayers Assim alhakeem
transcript: um so yesterday i asked um if there was another timetable that we could use um besides umakura for isha and you said um university of karachi so is that one like one that we can use for aisha while using umakura for the rest for for the rest of the prayers correct okay thank you you're welcome
